speaker: Shivani Patel
title: MLOps feature dive: Manage your assets, artifacts and code
description:
In this video, you’ll learn why and how to track assets and code you’re creating in an end to end machine learning workflow.

Jump To: 
[01:20] How to track assets and artifacts
[04:20] Demo - How to keep track of code
[05:58] Why it's important to manage datasets + Demo
